facts.1: National Simplicity Day is celebrated on July 12th to honor the life and work of Henry David Thoreau, an advocate for simple living.
facts.2: The day encourages people to declutter their lives, focus on what truly matters, and appreciate the beauty of simplicity.
facts.3: Activities on this day often include spending time in nature, practicing mindfulness, and reducing material possessions.

facts.1: National Pecan Pie Day celebrates the classic Southern dessert made with pecans, corn syrup, and a buttery crust.
facts.2: Pecan pie is a staple at holiday gatherings and is enjoyed for its rich, sweet flavor and crunchy texture.
facts.3: The day encourages people to bake and enjoy pecan pie with family and friends, experimenting with different recipes and variations.

facts.1: Paper Bag Day is observed on July 12th to celebrate the invention of the paper bag and its various uses.
facts.2: The day promotes the use of paper bags as an eco-friendly alternative to plastic bags, helping to reduce environmental impact.
facts.3: Paper bags are versatile and can be used for shopping, storage, crafts, and more, making them a valuable everyday item.
